attributes.action: send somebody senior to the NW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to confidentially discuss my PhD funding,  research findings, assignments and student loan / liaison with the bank ... 

Just in case, there is anything dodgy in your mind, Prime Minister, can I take this opportunity to point out,

1. Four of cousins are prop forwards
2. How big my big brother is
3. Another two are SAS trained
4. Another big big brother is in newspapers
5. How pissed off I am about the management of one of my PhD assignments, media attention and lack of copyright law and confidentiality that your administration has paid 
6. How pissed off I am at the harrassment from Lloyds I am receiving 
7. How little confidence I have in Cheshire Constabulary response to my complaints of death threats against my life  
8. Should any of this go to court, I shall probably have some of the best legal representation in Europe

Do you wish to settle this out of court ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
